description:
Trafalgar Law finds trouble in the form of an old acquaintance, Chopper investigates the Master`s lab, and the mysterious Samurai shows what he can do with a full body!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Samurai Who Can Cut Fire! Foxfire Kin`emon!
Honoo Kirisaku Samurai! Kitsunebi no Kin`emon!
Le samouraï flamboyant. Kinemon, le renard à la flamme !
Самурай, режущий огонь! Огненный Лис Кинемон!
炎切り裂く侍! 狐火の錦えもん!
